content: Yes, customers have the option to upgrade to a higher tier car for a specified time period for an upgrade fee. This can be facilitated through the customer service team or through a self-service platform, such as a mobile app. The fee would cover the cost of upgrading to the higher tier car, including any differences in rental price and insurance coverage. The exact cost would depend on factors such as the duration of the upgrade, the difference in cost between the original rental and the upgraded rental, and any other associated costs such as insurance coverage.
